description: Archbishop of Dublin Diarmuid Martin says that "disregard" of public health policy is "unacceptable".
title: Coronavirus: Archbishop of Dublin issues warning after church opens for Mass
title_page: Coronavirus: Archbishop of Dublin issues warning after church opens for Mass - BBC News
maintext: He said that initially those who wished to attend Mass stayed in a porch area at the back of the church but that "around 10 days ago", during windy weather, an area was set up just inside the porch to allow parishioners to sit down.
